full_text: Peel Paes hi are in Ree IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/723 PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS MONDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 18TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8526 of 2017 SC NO.529/2017 OF ADDITIONAL DISTRICT COURT-I, THALASSERY IN CRIME NO.1760 OF 2016 OF MATTANNORE POLICE STATION PETITIONER/2ND ACCUSED MUHAMMED SHAREEF (SHOWN AS SHAREEF IN THE F.I.R) S/O. BEERAN, AGED 34 YEARS, KANNOTH KALARIKKANDY, KEEZHALLUR P.O, KANNUR (DT) . BY ADV.SRI.CIBI THOMAS RESPONDENTS /COMPLAINANT/STATE: 1. SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE MATTANNORE POLICE STATION, KANNUR DISTRICT 670 702. 2. STATE OF KERALA REP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI - 682 031. R1 & R2 BY SR.PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SHRI.C.N.PRABHAKARAN THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-0O1- 2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: vgd Bl 2018/KER/723 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Dated this the 8 day of January, 2018 ORDER The petitioner stands arrayed as the 2" accused in S.C. No.529/2017 of Additional District Court 1, Thalassery arising from Crime No.1760/2016 of Mattannore Police Station for offences punishable under Sections 7 read with Section 8 of the POCSO Act. According to the petitioner, pursuant to the final report filed, cognizance was taken and summons was issued to him. Since he was away in connection with his employment, he could not appear before the court below. 2. The petitioner submits that he is ready and willing to appear before the court below, submit himself to the jurisdiction and to participate in all future proceedings personally or through his counsel. However, his apprehension is that since warrant has been issued, the court below is not likely to take up the applications to recall warrant and for bail on the same day of his appearance and he is likely to be remanded. 3. Having considered the limited prayer sought by the petitioner herein, notwithstanding the fact that he is involved in two other cases of similar nature, still, to meet the ends of justice Bee ape 2018/KER/723 Cri. M. C. No. 8526 of 2017 2 and to facilitate an early conclusion of the trial, | am inclined to permit the petitioner to surrender before the court below within 10 days from today. If he surrenders within 10 days from today and files applications for bail and to recall warrant, the same shall be considered by the court below on the same day itself. The warrant, if any issued from the court below will be kept in abeyance till his actual date of appearance within the above 10 days. Crl.M.C. is disposed of accordingly. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS, JUDGE. /true copy/ P. A. to Judge Pn
